title: Salamanders chew with their palate
summary: The Italian Crested Newt eats anything and everything it can overpower. Earthworms, mosquito larvae and water fleas are on its menu, but also snails, small fish and even its own offspring. A research team has now studied the newt's chewing behavior and has made an astounding discovery.

summary_detail.value: The Italian Crested Newt eats anything and everything it can overpower.
